column1: Hank! Here let me break off a piece okay.
It's what makes them and breaks them aswell.
oh dear I can't break them either
if I went in that I would break it!
you'll break one of my ornaments.
is that a broken one love?
who broke it? it was Rachel
you know you couldn't break those if you tried.
next year I'm breaking my heart over it so I am.
I know it breaks your heart doesn't it?
well he broke it and it was a good one
it breaks your heart doesn't it?
